title.newValue: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: [OCR] [ODSP] OCR Support for embedded images on SPOD

description.newValue:
Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. 

Aim is to Support OCR for images embedded in: 
1. Hybrid PDF file - PDF files with both images and searchable text
2. Office files - DOCX, PPTX, XLSX
3. Container files - zip, rar, 7z, etc.
